title: Sell Scotch
metaDescription: Sell your scotch whisky collection to Proof Cellars. We buy Macallan, rare single malts, and limited editions. Get a direct offer with no consignment fees.
heroSubhead: We buy scotch whisky directly - from rare single malts to full collections.
introParagraph: From rare Macallan releases to vintage single malts, we purchase scotch whisky directly with no consignment fees. Submit photos and details of your bottles, receive an offer typically within one business day, and get paid after we verify your items.
whatWeBuy: Macallan (especially older releases and limited editions)
Rare and vintage single malt scotch
Age-stated single malts from premium distilleries
whatWeDoNotBuy: Bottles with compromised seals or signs of tampering
Items we cannot legally purchase in your state
conditionNotes: Scotch whisky condition is evaluated based on fill level, seal integrity, label condition, and overall presentation. Original packaging significantly impacts value for many collectible bottles. Vintage bottles may show age-appropriate wear, but signs of leakage, tampering, or severe damage typically disqualify a bottle from consideration.
pricingFactors: Provenance and storage history when known
Completeness of original packaging and papers
